But also she repeatedly referenced a movie long before we moved from 3998 Hwy 17 Wrens, Ga (the house my father built) to Bartow which means this occurred prior to my 17th year and in fact I think may even have happened prior to her first attempt to have me clinically diagnosed as insane back when I was 14 and she had me committed (keep in mind I took the physical receipts of all that documentation and not just copies but took her evidence away and made it my own).

Title: Symbolic Threat and Psychological Gaslighting "A Beautiful Mind"
Source: Personal Witness Statement Ethan Ross Womack

Narrative Statement (Verbatim Record)

The name of that movie is A Beautiful Mind.
